content:
I'd be happy to help you find digital coupons for Tide, Gain, and Crest on your loyalty cards.

**ShopRite:**

1. Visit ShopRite's website: [www.shoprite.com](http://www.shoprite.com)
2. Click on "Digital Coupons" at the top of the page
3. Sign in to your ShopRite account or register if you haven't already
4. Search for "Tide", "Gain", or "Crest" in the search bar
5. Click on the desired coupon to add it to your loyalty card
6. Review your digital coupons in the "My Coupons" section

**Giant Food Stores:**

1. Visit Giant Food Stores' website: [www.giantfoodstores.com](http://www.giantfoodstores.com)
2. Click on "Digital Coupons" at the top of the page
3. Sign in to your Giant Food Stores account or register if you haven't already
4. Search for "Tide", "Gain", or "Crest" in the search bar
5. Click on the desired coupon to add it to your loyalty card
6. Review your digital coupons in the "My Coupons" section

You can also use the mobile apps for both stores to access and add digital coupons to your loyalty card:

* ShopRite App: [www.shoprite.com/mobile-app](http://www.shoprite.com/mobile-app)
* Giant Food Stores App: [www.giantfoodstores.com/mobile-app](http://www.giantfoodstores.com/mobile-app)

Remember to check the expiration dates and terms of each digital coupon to ensure they are valid at the time of your purchase.

I hope this helps you find some digital coupons for your loyalty cards!
